website_summaries.verdict: You can't go wrong with this classic Vans shoe. Their first product, it has been in production since 1966. The quintessential casual footwear.
pros: Sturdy canvas upper and waffle-tread rubber outer sole
Amazing array of colors, including black, white, brights, color combos, and a few prints
Sizing for both men and women
cons: A handful of customers say the sole separated from the upper after only a few months wear

customer_reviews.title: Used shoes?
customer_reviews.text: Came in a plain brown box, no Vans materials with it. Used? Because they are worn, dirty, and already laced. What's the deal?
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Vans and I’m surprised how comfortable they are. My feet are wide and I struggle with All Stars, but these are very comfortable. Shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I'm not sure that I'd recommend them for hours and hours of standing. If you have a job that expects you to stand for eight hours, I'd probably get extra support arches to slip into these. Otherwise, they're great. It's a simple, clean look, and they are comfortable. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for Business-Casual Work Environment
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work, I work in a business-casual work environment and these are great. They just edge the line of whats business and whats casual and I love that I don't have to pack a change of shoes to put on after I get off work. Very easy to clean, but they do show dirty very easily, but all black shoes will. They're very comfortable, but I do get a blister on the side of my pinky toe if I walk too much, but thats because I have wide feet, not the fault of the shoe. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria F

customer_reviews.title: I love these vans
customer_reviews.text: I love these vans! Fits true to size. They wear great! I wore them exclusively during a 3 month stay in Germany. They walked many miles and show no major wear. They are comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wise

customer_reviews.title: ... what can you expect there always going to be great fits true to size box was really really beat ...
customer_reviews.text: They’re vans what can you expect there always going to be great fits true to size box was really really beat up but shoes are in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent shoe for the price I suppose, but simply will not last if you are into what this shoe is designed for. Skateboard and scootering are hard on shoes, however the converse is a better option and has out lasted the vans for myself and my son.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the discounted price. There is a slight imperfection in the rubber, it kinda bulges out. But for the price I paid it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: TabbyKat

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shoe for flat feet. I have worn converse all my life and my feet would hurt after awhile because I have flat feet I decided to give vans a try and my feet were not hurting even when I got home to take them off my feet were okay if you have feet fleet get vans!
customer_reviews.author: adriana nelson

customer_reviews.title: These should fit the bill.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of closed shoes (I've lived in FL for 14 yrs and wear sandals, fulltime) but I think that these will suit my need. They are a good fit and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vans!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I have super flat feet and these are the only sneakers that don't hurt to wear. Like any shoe, they need to be broken in first, though. These came sooner than expected, only two days, without a Prime account. Right size, right color, authentic box, and even the Vans logo sticker attached to an eyelet. I am thrilled! The only store near me that sells Vans is pretty far away so ordering online was much easier for me!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Broom

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Vans
customer_reviews.text: They kind of got lost in transit but were found a few days later. He says they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: ube

customer_reviews.title: Strange lace placement
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I've had to lace them with a "heel slipping" kind of lace formation. I'm not sure if this is because of my foot, which is highly arched and narrow, but my heels definitely slip out of these without socks (if there's anything different with socks, I'll let y'all know.) The laces and shoe tongue don't come down far enough to actually hold my foot down but I love these shoes regardless. They're quite lovely and I'm glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Sanjana Ramesh

customer_reviews.title: Van's Authentic Core Classics
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teen daughter, this specific style and color is the only one she will wear. She really likes them and for the price, and I shopped around before I made the purchase because the prices vary widely, I bought 2 pair. One for now, one for when the first ones wear out. This particular vendor, whom I have bought from several times, has the best price and free shipping. Can't beat that! Yes, even mom is satisfied😃😃😃. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mary l.

customer_reviews.title: simple perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I think I've owned 30 pairs of these shoes. I go through them in like 3-6 months but they are my go to shoes. Easy to put on nice and simple. They can be dress shoes or casual sneakers. They go everywhere do anything.. except maybe snow or heavy rain.(duh they're canvas) They are no complication shoes PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 yr old son loves these and this is probably his 4th pair. He wears them year round. They are stylish and can handle daily wear! This is his 4th pair bc they are a wardrobe staple for him, not due to lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Lisfn

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Size runs large. My granddaughter ordered these in a 9 and they were too large. She takes a 9 in all other shoes. These shoes were returned and I was refunded the cost. We purchased a size 8 elsewhere in these same shoes and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Back -n- Black
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected because my son and I own at least 10 pairs of Vans so we know that they run about 1/2 size small. These are tough looking lace up classics in all black. Cool shoes for skate, BMX or just casual coolness.
customer_reviews.author: Garot M. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it right!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Finally wide enough for my pudgy feet. My only care is that they are very stiff so I will wash them before wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Smith-Davis

customer_reviews.title: The Great ole Classic Vans fit and style lives on .
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and this pair 50 something for me . Well made with quality materials , looks great and fits like a champ. Vans quality living on strong , gotta love a classic!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Classic Vans
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find classic Van's again. They fit like any pair of Van's - simple, plenty of room in the toe box, no arch support
customer_reviews.author: breanna

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love vans!!! I usually go to the mall but I hate going just not a mall person. It's my first time ordering them on amazon I'm sooooo happy with my purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Kinda narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size I always order in Vans, they fit a bit tight, maybe they will stretch out over time
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic and poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, definitely do not think these are real! Buys beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much to really say.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing more to say other than the Fit was as expected when following the company's guidelines. Most people ordering these have likely already owned a pair of Vans at some point and love them.
customer_reviews.author: vietwolf25

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really fell in love with the platform version of this shoe. Unfortunately I bought these before I discovered the platform edition. All in all this shoe is very comfortable but I will be giving them to my sister. She adores them
customer_reviews.author: A. Mebane

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ended Up having to return these, they sent me a shoe that was not pictured. I was expecting a black shoe with a white soul and white laces Like the one pictured but the shoe they sent me was all black and black laces
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: There Vans new in a box
customer_reviews.text: They are the real deal I wish it would have came with extra laces but other than that I love them
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: I love Vans!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 9th pair of vans, All of my vans actually fell apart after wearing them for 8+ years consistently, This is my first them getting them in all black and I don't regret it one bit. Will purchase more in the future. SideNote: These came in 5 days!
customer_reviews.author: Sarina.S

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: These were way too big. It had two sizes one on the box and a different size inside the shoe. I am shipping them back as soon as I can get to the Post Office.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoes, but, oh well.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are standard vans. Im not sure what some of the reviews are refering to. They did ship different colored rubber bottoms then the ones in the picture that i bought. They were supposed to be black with natural rubber and instead they were back with white bottoms. It works fine. The rubber would have looked better with my work uniform but all is well
customer_reviews.author: Smd

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I already had these and they were getting worn out! I love these shoes very flat no support really but I didnt expect that out of these! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He has always worn Vans but I had never ordered online...glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Hermelinda Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, little big
customer_reviews.text: Okay shoe, a little big. No support, but I expected that with vans. Color and material are great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hornbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Came in a vans box with vans tags. Clean and perfect new sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: iluvmikey07

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: Did not give me the correct vans but it will do :(
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe until I started getting holes in it after 2 months. I don’t even work hard with them or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kel2ie

customer_reviews.title: CLASSIC SHOES ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: i'm a sucker for the classics and this shoe is one of them! Love my vans, the fit, the style...everything about them! They are comfortable, no rubbing on the heels, no breaking in period needed. I do have narrow feet in general, so I could see how this shoe might not work for those with wide feet. Also, probably not the nest for arch support, but I have a high arch and still feel that these are comfy all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Vans before and they still fit as expected, but they sent me a color that I did not request to order. I ordered the classic black with white soles and received black with black soles. Not bad shoes, but the black on black is not really my style and it's not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Found the sneaker to be heavy and hard. Not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rho27

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite All-Black shoe.
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and of great quality. I had my pair now for about 8 months. They are still black and I keep them clean by hand-washing them in cold water with gentle detergent. I got the 10.5 D(M) size and they fit perfectly when tied. They don't slip off, but if I am in a hurry, I can slip them on in an instant. Vans Authentic Skate Shoes is the way to go if you want a high-quality casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Brotherhood1994x

customer_reviews.title: Off-white tone
customer_reviews.text: Gift. I was unsure b/c she requested white and this is more ivory. The fit and look are just as pic shows. They went over well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rinko

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, lasted the whole year with minor holes. Gets dirty quick. Not insulated so got a tear in it pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but runs big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these, but they weren't the model I wanted... My mistake. They were big on me so I gave them to my daughter and she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great for price
customer_reviews.text: Just right fit. The look was just like he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: escarden79

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe didn't come in an authentic Vans shoebox. It was in a regular brown shoebox. The Vans tag was also taken off. They seem authentic, I wore them once. Will update if I have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kozy

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe. I just keep reordering them. I basically wear them with every outfit. A little cheaper here than on the Vans website.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: We usually go to the vans store to get these shoes, but getting them online with prime shipping just seems so much easier! They fit great and look great. My only complaint is that they fade. After about 3-4 months of use, the color fades to a weird purple brown black color. I don't know if it's the sun, or what, but they do fade a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with these classic vans. I use them as my caul day off shoes and they get me around town. The only problem I had with them was early on to break them in when I would get blisters on the back of my heels but to their defense, they were brand spanking new and I wasn't wearing socks and it probably has a lot to do with my sensitive feminine feet.
customer_reviews.author: victoriao1205

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Too bad it doesn't fit and you have to pay for return shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I love Vans. Just barely didn't fit. I didn't realize I needed to pay for the return shipping, which was about $13, so I removed a star.
customer_reviews.author: Tonhu (Lotus) Dao

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied daughter......
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always needs to be the fashion queen. She started a housekeeping job and they told her she needed all black shoes. She couldn't be like everyone else she just had to have Vans. They fit perfect other than they need to be broke in, and she has received lots of compliments. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: guerrap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They fit perfectly, they look nice, and they've held up quite nice to my abuse. Unfortunately I don't take better care of them and I got them pretty dirty. The good part is that they are quite affordable. I wear them with shorts and jeans and have no complaints. I recommend this shoe to anyone at any age groups that is looking for a simple, light, comfortable, casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: They're good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoes there so comfortable on the inside i would really would like to buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: If my daughter could wear these shoes every single day, she would. She said they are comfortable and fit perfectly. I'm always skeptical of ordering shoes online but the convenience of amazon ordering and amazon prime makes this choice a "no brainer".
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Speights

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love. I wear them all the time. I let them dirty up for effect, but they actually stayed quite white for a long time. They have traveled with me everywhere, and even after almost a year of wear, they have no signs of falling apart, aside from a little tear on the rubber where the toe creases when I step. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Seller sucks
customer_reviews.text: Canvas came unglued from the rubber sole after less than a week. Seller refuses to address issue because we do not have the shoe box. Buy from another seller!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zima

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks slightly
customer_reviews.text: This may be just me, but the left shoe squeaks when I walk. Also, the shoes wear out relatively fast; this may be because I'm on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: cathy_tuileries

customer_reviews.title: Red Van's Tennis
customer_reviews.text: XLNT quality. I get complemented on my red Van's all the time. Also, I wash my Van's in the washing machine and air dry on patio, no problem doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Morris

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes have been worn a lot by my daughter and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: InMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the ones my gf uses. She was happy and it was also a good price at the time. Around 45 dollars. Better then in store price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: The fit and style look great
customer_reviews.text: Like all vans these were great. Fit nice and great style.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with buying these shoes. They look nice, the feel good, and they last long. Giving this 4 stars since after the first day of wearing them (3 hours of light walking), I got the worst blisters. I'd buy again, but I'd put a bandaid on your foot before breaking these in.
customer_reviews.author: Shiba Chowder

customer_reviews.title: She loved them, likes that they look just like Tyler's
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for Daughter who is a Twenty One Pilots fan. She loved them, likes that they look just like Tyler's! They look super cute on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Steph H

customer_reviews.title: very bad
customer_reviews.text: very bad, i opened the box, and founs the item have a big cut on the side, and had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Hussien El-Sawy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite shoes!!! Super comfortable Wortham for a full day of Disney walking never got a blister and no sore feet definitely going to buy more!!!
customer_reviews.author: nessa

customer_reviews.title: 59 and loving these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I’m 59 and they feel great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Seale

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable, lasted me a good 2 years, and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: vans
customer_reviews.text: Again this purchase was done by my Son, he is very found of Amazon, to be honest I don't know how he feels about the shoes all I know is he is wearing them and I haven't heard him complain about anything I asked him if they were too tight and he said no so I assumed they are exactly the way he want them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: vans bought online
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with how well these shoes fit and how stylish they are. they were about the same in price compared to the stores but you don't have to leave home to get them and you know for sure that the website Amazon has it and you don't have to drive around looking for that especific color
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Branson

customer_reviews.title: Great style, great comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This style is pretty universal and goes with almost anything. I have worn the shoes everyday for about 8-12 hours a day for about 4 months and they are holding up just fine. They do require abit of cleaning every couple of days if you want to maintain that brand new look, but I do not mind. I recommend these shoes to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Jurado

customer_reviews.title: reads the correct size, but it is not.
customer_reviews.text: right size, but was really small. Since I have triplets that all wear the same size and style, I know the shoe was not correct. He wore them, so I can't return them. :(
customer_reviews.author: malinda matthews

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Product is exactly as explained in description. I will be repurchasing in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: The vans fit and looked perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was just as what expected.... the size what really the size as advertised and the color style was also what expected, I would by another pair from this vender...
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Crap for actually skateboarding.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why these are called skate shoes. My grip tape tore these things up after one session and now they are unwearable. My pinky toe got all bloody. Not a fan, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dolemite Johnsonstein

customer_reviews.title: Son said they provided good arch support (Mom would differ in opinion)
customer_reviews.text: Son said they provided good arch support (Mom would differ in opinion). He loves them. They are in style at school. However, they are not athletic shoes, so no....they do not provide arch support. They are flat.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kinton

customer_reviews.title: Not my Mother's Keds!
customer_reviews.text: My teen wears these but she even admits they aren't the most comfortable for a day of walking. But Vans are a statement and that's pretty much it. I will say that they hold up well when washed and she has worn them alot.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D Hoefs

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like them the way they are. I wore my last pair until they start to show holes. I wore them for 5 years. Almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Novak

customer_reviews.title: with Vans you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that kept me from giving it a 5-star review is the disappointment at finding out that Vans are now made in China.I guess only time will tell if being manufactured outside the states affects the quality I've depended on for the last 30 years
customer_reviews.author: AVacek

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe for both men and women.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. I had to return as I ordered the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: linda benefield

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get them for Christmas, but still a great price and product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: M. S. White

customer_reviews.title: VANS are always a good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for a Angel Tree child, I pray they fit him well and he gets good use out of these. My son wore these when he was younger and rode skateboards. Vans are good quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: godister

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my son for Christmas. They were delivered in a timely fashion. The quality of the shoes exceeded my expectations and he is very happy with them. I am glad I made this purchase, and would recommend these shoes as a great online purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Catfish
customer_reviews.text: If you're gonna use them for work maybe pick something else. I love vans but it's been like a week and they already looked aged. Not too sure if they'll last too long.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable -- comparable to Chuck Taylors. Same sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Shera

customer_reviews.title: RAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these vans. The black on black vans must be in!! I haven't been able to get her to wear anything else for 2 years now. They are great shoes. Fit nice and look professional. Not only that but are supper comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy but I wasn't expecting it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfy but I wasn't expecting it to be. Idk if it was worth the price but Vans are always expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for a few months but they come apart too easily. After a few months we had to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser of Things

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition love them
customer_reviews.text: Got a size 7 fits true to size. Came in perfect condition love them.
customer_reviews.author: amber franklin

customer_reviews.title: Might just be because I chose the wrong size but ...
customer_reviews.text: Might just be because I chose the wrong size but they are a little small but I didn't wanna have to deal with shipping them back and waiting on new ones
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I usually range from 6. 5-7, depending on ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually range from 6.5-7, depending on the company. These fit well but if I wear them for extended amounts of time (like walking and sightseeing for the entire day), I get blisters in my heels.
customer_reviews.author: gauri

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The style of the shoes are what I wanted, fit was perfect, being that I have wide feet. Although some of the color options was kinda limited for my size.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Miller

customer_reviews.title: They've worn a pretty good amount over the past year or so
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly for me, though I admit my feet may be more meant to wear size "10" in general, though I always order 10.5 anyways. They've worn a pretty good amount over the past year or so, but within reason considering how much they've been through. They still look fine, but I find it moderately difficult to clean them back to a state that looks new in any way. That is the nature of the shoes though, I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Sante Howard

customer_reviews.title: I don't think you could ever go wrong with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you could ever go wrong with a pair of classic black Vans. These will be forever in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of vans, but they aren't exactly made for people with wide feet. So be aware, if you do have wider feet, you may have to order a pair 1/2 size bigger than your usual size, other than that, these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Im an avid van owner and never had a pair quite like these. They looked authentic but the feel was abit flimsy... The van logo on the back started coming off just about a week after getting them.. I own about 8 pairs of vans and about 34 pairs of shoes in total so i know over wearing these was not the case.. I give this purchase 3 stars only because of my love for amazon. Had this been any other company it would be a call to corprate and a request for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio M.

customer_reviews.title: nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love them I should have gotten more than just one color like Red White or maybe a grey but love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Williams

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: If you know your shoe size then they will be just as you expected. The picture you see is the color you will get. Very reliable shoe and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CCorona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits great, my son has had them in every size!
customer_reviews.author: sf1277

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I recommend anyone buying it. It was delivered in a timely manner and I had no problems with the company, at all. A 5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I loved them, but they seemed to run a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved them, but they seemed to run a little small. I wore this exact same style of Vans back in my teen growing up in Southern California in the 70's. I will be exchanging them for the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: julie a gappmayer

product_meta.title: Vans Authentic Core Classic Sneakers
product_meta.description: Vans Men's Authentic Pump. Lace up, contrasted stitching, Vans tab logo to side, rubberized logo to heel, reinforced toe piece.Textile Upper & Inner, Synthetic Sole.
